Open 'https://example.com/products/item-101'

Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is shown, enabled, has background color #007bff, foreground color #ffffff, text size 16px, text weight 500, corner radius 4px, inner spacing 10px 20px, horizontal dimension 150px, vertical dimension 40px, and accessibility label 'Add selected item to cart'
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button hover background color transitions to #0056b3 over 200ms and outline is 1px solid #0056b3
Open 'https://user.profile.com/me'

Verify the profile image element has source 'avatar.jpg', alt text 'User profile picture', intrinsic size 200x200px, display size 100x100px, shape circle, border radius 50%, opacity 1, rendering duration < 500ms, positioned at x 20px, y 80px, with a 2px solid #cccccc outline
Open 'https://search.example.com'

Verify the search input field has placeholder text 'Search products...', type size 14px, typeface 'Arial', foreground color #333333, fill color #ffffff, outline 1px solid #cccccc, padding 8px 12px, width 300px, height 36px, and is visible
Verify the search input field focused outline color changes to #007bff and background color becomes #f0f8ff with a 150ms transition
Open 'https://media.site.com/video/clip.mp4'
Verify the video player's 'Play' button is shown, has icon color #ffffff, fill color #ff0000, corner radius 50%, width 50px, height 50px, and aria-label 'Play video'
Verify the video is not muted initially
Verify the 'Fullscreen' button is enabled with opacity 1
Open 'https://dashboard.site.com'
Verify the 'Reports' navigation link has text 'Reports', text size 15px, text weight 600, foreground color #333333, positioned at left 20px, top 100px, and horizontal dimension 180px
Verify the 'Reports' navigation link, when highlighted, has background hue #e0f0ff, foreground color #007bff, left border 4px solid #007bff, and inner spacing-left 16px
Verify the results table contains exactly 10 rows
Verify each row has a vertical dimension of 40px and background color alternating between #f9f9f9 and #ffffff
Verify the 'Status' column text is center aligned, with font size 13px
Verify the 'Date' column displays dates in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format, e.g., '2023-10-26'
Verify the table's outer spacing-top is 20px
Trigger the 'Delete Account' action on 'https://settings.site.com'
Verify the confirmation modal dialog is visible, centered on screen, has width 400px, height 250px, background color #ffffff, corner radius 8px, transparency 1, and a 300ms fade-in animation
Verify the 'Cancel' button is left-aligned within the footer, with text color #6c757d and background #e9ecef
Open 'https://gallery.photos.com/album/nature'
Verify the main image is visible, has src 'forest_hero.jpg', display size 800x600px, loads within 1.2s, and has no visible watermark
Verify 5 thumbnail images are displayed, each 100x75px, with a 1px solid #dddddd outline and 'Nature image' as alt text
Verify a 20px outer spacing-top separates the main image from thumbnails
Attempt to submit an empty form on 'https://login.example.com'

Verify the error message 'Please fill out all required fields.' appears with type size 14px, foreground color #dc3545, text weight 500, background color #ffe0e0, inner spacing 10px, is shown, positioned directly below the input field at y+5px, has a horizontal dimension equal to the input field's width of 250px, and border radius 4px
Open 'https://settings.app.com/preferences'
Verify the 'Dark Mode' toggle switch is visible, enabled, in the 'off' state initially, has width 50px, height 28px, and border radius 14px
Click the 'Dark Mode' toggle switch
Verify the 'Dark Mode' toggle switch state changes to 'on', background hue transitions from #cccccc to #007bff over 200ms, and accessibility label changes from 'Dark mode is off' to 'Dark mode is on'
Click on the 'Options' dropdown on 'https://tool.site.com'
Verify the dropdown menu becomes shown, positioned at left 10px, top 40px, has a horizontal dimension 180px, background color #ffffff, and outline 1px solid #ced4da
Verify there are exactly 4 menu items, each with text color #212529 and type size 14px
Verify each menu item's background hue changes to #f8f9fa on hover
Start a file upload on 'https://cloud.storage.com/upload'
Verify the progress bar element is visible, positioned at x 100px, y 200px, has a vertical dimension of 10px, background color #e9ecef, and corner radius 5px
Verify the inner progress indicator has background color #28a745, and its width dynamically updates from 0% to 100% with a 500ms transition for each segment
Verify the current percentage text '50%' is visible and color #212529
Open 'https://blog.example.com/articles?page=1'
Verify the pagination control is visible at the bottom right
Verify the 'Next' button is enabled, has text 'Next', background color #007bff, foreground color #ffffff, font size 14px, inner spacing 8px 12px, corner radius 4px
Verify the 'Previous' button is disabled with transparency 0.6
Verify there are exactly 5 page number buttons, each 32px wide and 32px high
Open 'https://www.corporate.com'
Verify the header bar is fixed position (scroll-top property check), has a vertical dimension of 60px, fill color #ffffff, bottom border 1px solid #e0e0e0, and transparency 1
Verify the 'Logo' image has src 'logo.png', display size 120x40px, and is aligned left with an outer spacing-left of 20px
Verify the 'Contact Us' button has text 'Contact Us', foreground color #007bff, text weight 600, and inner spacing 8px 15px
Hover over the '?' icon on 'https://help.example.com/faq'

Verify a tooltip appears with text 'Get more information', text size 12px, background color #333333, foreground color #ffffff, padding 5px 8px, corner radius 3px, opacity 0.9, positioned below the icon at y+10px, with visibility changing with a 100ms fade-in/out transition, and horizontal dimension 150px
Open 'https://signup.example.com'

Verify the 'Agree to Terms' checkbox is visible, not active/selected, enabled, has label text 'Agree to Terms', horizontal dimension 20px, vertical dimension 20px, border 1px solid #ced4da, outer spacing-right 8px, and aria-label 'Agree to terms and conditions'
Click the 'Agree to Terms' checkbox
Verify the 'Agree to Terms' checkbox becomes active/selected, its background color changes to #007bff, and outline color changes to #007bff
Open 'https://stock.photos.com/preview/image-001'
Verify the main image is loaded within 1s, has intrinsic size 1920x1080px, display size 600x400px, src 'image_preview.jpg', and alt text 'Scenic mountain view'
Verify a 'PREVIEW' watermark is visible over the image, positioned centrally with opacity 0.5, type size 48px, color rgba(255,255,255,0.7), and font weight 700
Open 'https://news.website.com'

Verify the cookie consent banner appears at the bottom of the viewport, with background color #333333, foreground color #ffffff, inner spacing 15px 20px, vertical dimension 70px, and remains fixed at the bottom via scroll property
Verify the 'Accept' button is visible, enabled, has text 'Accept', fill color #28a745, corner radius 4px, and its right edge is 20px from the viewport's right edge
Open 'https://footer.company.com'
Verify the social media icon group is visible at x 900px, y 1000px, aligned to the right, and has an outer spacing-top of 40px
Verify there are exactly 3 icons: 'Facebook', 'Twitter', 'LinkedIn'
Verify the 'Facebook' icon has width 32px, height 32px, shape circle, border radius 50%, and background color #007bff
Verify the 'Twitter' icon has width 32px, height 32px, shape circle, border radius 50%, and background color #1DA1F2
Verify the 'LinkedIn' icon has width 32px, height 32px, shape circle, border radius 50%, and background color #0077B5
Verify each icon's opacity changes to 0.8 over 100ms on hover
Open 'https://app.settings.com/sections'
Click the 'General' tab
Verify the 'General' tab becomes highlighted, with background color #ffffff, bottom border 2px solid #007bff, foreground color #007bff, text weight 600, and inner spacing 10px 15px
Verify the content pane below is visible and displays text 'General settings are displayed here.' with font size 14px, foreground color #333333
Verify the 'Account' tab is inactive, with text color #6c757d
Verify the tabs element has an outer spacing-bottom of 20px
